hero.description: Learn advanced financial modeling, derivative pricing and risk management with interactive exercises and real-world simulations.
hero.tagline: USED BY TRADERS FROM LEADING INSTITUTIONS

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: Learn through hands-on practice with interactive tools built by finance professionals for finance professionals.

pragmatic.title: Pragmatic Learning
pragmatic.description: Focus on applicable concepts and real-world problems through interactive exercises.

tech.title: Modern Tech Stack
tech.description: Use Python, R and other modern tools that quantitative professionals use daily.

job.title: Job-Ready Skills
job.description: Develop the exact skills employers are looking for in quant analysts and traders.

certified.title: Industry Certified
certified.description: Earn certificates recognized by leading financial institutions worldwide.

curriculum.title: Comprehensive Curriculum
curriculum.description: Our curriculum covers everything from options pricing fundamentals to advanced stochastic calculus and sophisticated risk models.

blackScholes.title: Black-Scholes Fundamentals
blackScholes.description: Master the cornerstone model of option pricing theory and derivative valuation.

volatility.title: Implied Volatility Structures
volatility.description: Understand volatility surfaces, skew, and term structure for smarter trading decisions.

exotic.title: Exotic Options & Barriers
exotic.description: Learn to price and hedge path-dependent and exotic derivative products.

greeks.title: Greeks & Sensitivities
greeks.description: Master the risk sensitivities and hedging techniques for option portfolios.

monteCarlo.title: Monte Carlo Methods
monteCarlo.description: Implement numerical simulation techniques for pricing complex derivatives.

stressTesting.title: Stress Testing & Risk
stressTesting.description: Design and implement stress tests for derivative portfolios under extreme scenarios.

testimonials.title: What Our Students Say
testimonials.description: Join thousands of professionals who have transformed their careers through our platform.

alexandre.quote: The interactive pricing tools and real-time market data made complex concepts tangible. Got a quant trading role after completing the certification.
alexandre.author: Alexandre Martin

sarah.quote: Transitioned from pure mathematics to quantitative finance in just 6 months thanks to the rigorous yet practical curriculum.
sarah.author: Sarah Johnson

thomas.quote: The platform's community features and coding challenges helped me build a strong portfolio that impressed my current employer.
thomas.author: Thomas Dupont

cta.title: Take Your Finance Career to the Next Level
cta.description: Gain the quantitative skills that make you stand out in today's competitive market.

coursesPage.title: Our Courses
coursesPage.subtitle: Comprehensive quant finance education from basics to advanced methods

fundamentals.description: Essential concepts and models that form the foundation of quantitative finance

blackScholes.title: Black-Scholes & Fundamental Models
blackScholes.description: Master the cornerstone model of option pricing theory with step-by-step derivation and implementation

yieldCurves.title: Interest Rate Curves & Term Structure
yieldCurves.description: Understand yield curve construction, bootstrapping techniques and their applications in derivative pricing

greeks.title: Greeks & Sensitivities
greeks.description: Master risk sensitivities (Delta, Gamma, Vega, Theta, Rho) and practical hedging strategies

advanced.description: Sophisticated techniques for modeling complex market phenomena and pricing strategies

impliedVol.title: Implied Volatility Structures
impliedVol.description: Explore volatility surfaces, smile, skew, and term structure for more realistic option pricing

volProducts.title: Volatility Products & Trading
volProducts.description: Master variance swaps, volatility swaps, VIX futures and options, and vol targeting strategies

complex.description: Advanced pricing and hedging techniques for exotic derivatives and structured products

exotic.title: Exotic Options & Barriers
exotic.description: Learn to price and hedge path-dependent options and barrier products with various methods

monteCarlo.title: Monte Carlo for Path-Dependent Options
monteCarlo.description: Implement powerful Monte Carlo simulation techniques for pricing complex derivatives

cta.title: Ready to Master Quantitative Finance?
cta.description: Join thousands of professionals who have transformed their careers with our platform.

coursesPage.subscriptionAccess: Premium subscription gives you access to all modules and features

notebooks.title: Interactive Notebooks
notebooks.subtitle: Practice with executable code notebooks to master quantitative finance concepts

exercises.title: Exercises & Simulations
exercises.subtitle: Practice with interactive exercises and realistic market simulations

survivalMode.title: Survival Mode
survivalMode.subtitle: Test your quantitative finance knowledge in a fast-paced quiz challenge

rules.desc1: Each wave contains increasingly difficult pricing challenges that test your knowledge
rules.desc2: You have 3 lives. Each incorrect answer costs you one life. When you run out, it's game over
rules.desc3: Earn points for correct answers. The faster you answer, the more points you get

survivalMode.question: Question
survivalMode.tipText: For Black-Scholes pricing, remember that the formula assumes log-normal distribution of returns and constant volatility
survivalMode.gameOverSubtitle: See how well you did and how you compare to others
survivalMode.survivorBadge: You've earned the 'Survivor' badge for completing 5 waves

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.subtitle: See who's leading the pack in mastering quantitative finance
leaderboard.selectPlayerDesc: Click on any player in the leaderboard to see their detailed stats

community.title: Community
community.subtitle: Connect with fellow quant finance enthusiasts, share knowledge and collaborate
community.noPastEventsDesc: Stay tuned for our upcoming events and check back later for past event recordings and materials
community.proposeEventDesc: Have an idea for a webinar, hackathon, or meetup? Share it with the community!
community.membersPageComingDesc: We're building a comprehensive members directory with profiles, achievements, and networking features. Be the first to know when it launches!
